comments.text:
well, tell your best friend how you feel about her friend. Explain how she 
has hurt yourself and others. Try to avoid full out back-talking though. As 
tempting as it is, do NOT stoop to her level. Just try to avoid any contact

friend really is.

+valerie To make your story a bit more accurate I think that Tyler had

comments.author: Amanda Jean-Louis

comments.text:
OK SO, to shortly sum it up, about a year ago, Liam tweeted about how he 
loved the 'family values' of the people from the TV show 'Duck Dynasty'. 
What he did not realize was that since these people are quite religious, 
and do not believe in gay rights, Liam was also indirectly saying that he 
did not believe in gay rights either. His tweets caused a huge argument 
between Liam and news reporters, Liam and fans, and mostly Liam and Tyler 
(who said he was disappointed in Liam for saying something like that.) 
After the blow-up, Liam did apologize and say that he had nothing against 
gay people, and Tyler took a short break from twitter because all of the 
tweets and hate he was getting was a little overwhelming. :)
comments.author: brianna,,!

said he didn't mean to offend anyone, and how his intentions weren't to

captions.text:
- Why hello everyone.
My name is Tyler Oakley

and I want to have sit
down chat with you guys

and talk to you about
anything and everything
that you want to know about.
So it is time, for (singing).

@oaklays_wife would like to
know, who is you YouTube crush?

And I would probably have to
say right now I am loving me.
And I have no shame about it.
In the words of my good friend RuPaul
if you can't love yourself,

how the hell are you going
to love somebody else?
So right now I am focusing on me.

sam says, "Will you make a graph
of your sleeping schedule?"

Here's a little pie chart
of my sleeping schedule.
As you can see I don't sleep, at all.

Sometimes I close my eyes for
a second, but that's about it.
Look at me. Oh my God,

this is the most I've closed
my eyes in like eight years.
This is nice. Wow.
Emma says what was going through your mind
when you saw these pictures?
Um, I just...
As you guys know I made paper mache heads
with my good friend Corey.

If you want to see that video
you can click right here.

It was so fun, it was
my most recent collab.

But after that happened you
guys started Photoshopping

those heads onto my head,
anywhere and everywhere,
and I was dying.
Honestly, I was like,

"Dang ya'll are giving me
that Photoshop upgrade."

I'll take it where I can
get it, so thank you.

Thoughts on this hug that
happened at the Michigan meetup?
This warmed my heart!

Sometimes you guys do
your own little meetups
wherever you are in the world,
and you all come together.

This one in particular I
think you all met at a mall

and like hung out, and I don't
know what you actually did

but ya'll chilled for a
bit, and took pictures,
and made Vines, and went shopping,
and talked about your love for YouTube

and it warms my heart
because you know what?

At the end of the day, to see
that you guys find each other,
feel less alone in the world,
and make friends because of this,

that warms my heart, and that
makes everything worth it.

And sometimes, like I said,
I get a little bit stressed,

but then I see stuff like
that and I'm like, "Yes."
Mya says, "Do you like my drawing?"
Of course I do!

Anybody that supports Psycho
Babble I am obsessed with.
Thank you so much for tuning in.
I have said this before, I think,

but this is the most fun that
Corey and I have all week
is when we go into the studio
and record Psycho Babble episodes.
So thank you for supporting it.

It's a free gift to you
because we love you so much.

If you want to go on
itunes.com/psychobabble
you can subscribe for free.

I am going to put a
little challenge to you.

If you haven't subscribed
already I want this day

to be the day that it hits
number one on the charts.

All you've gotta do is go
to itunes.com/psychobabble
and subscribe for free,

and I think we can make it to
number one podcast of the day.
I think we can.

And I have a new thing that
I want to do with you guys.

If you want to chat about
some of the episodes,

every single Wednesday;
They come out on Tuesday

but every Wednesday I want to
chat with you guys about them.
Go follow me on Viber.

Viber is basically a free app
where you can connect with me
and you can chat with me one-on-one,
and it's a good way for me to actually
have conversations with you guys.

If you want to download it and
then follow my public chats

I am going to be there
every single Wednesday

chatting with you guys all
about each and every episode.
If you have questions I will answer them,

it's going to be a fun time,
so you might as well do that.

I'm going to put a link
below but again, it's free,

and if you want some
one-on-one Tyler chat time
you can download it.
Click the link below, download the app
and join my room.

And yeah, I can't wait
to chat with you guys

about anything and everything
you ever want to talk about.

Alex says, "Where are
you traveling to next?"

I am actually going to
Michigan for Christmas

and then I am going to
Australia for New Years.
But then after that I am taking some time
to just relax in January

and get down to business,
and get down to work

on some things that I
have been putting off
and trying to get accomplished.

Then maybe I can close my eyes
for more than eight seconds.
That would be nice.
Kay says "Do you have any opinions
"on this heartbreaking story?"
I mean ...
(clicks tongue) It's nuts.
Ahem, yep. I'm here all day. (laughs)
Kim says, "What did you think about
"the Kim K. pictures in that magazine?"
And I actually have my own copy.
I'm covering up the booty because

I don't know if that's
going to be allowed.

But I have my own copy,
and it's not because I

particularly liked the photo
shoot that Kim Kardashian did,

but instead I really
like the photo shoot that
this amazing blogger did for the magazine,
and that is me!
If you get the magazine you'll see
a little article all about me,

and a picture of me with a
big, huge, phallic candy cane,
because why not, it's Christmas time.

God bless, Santa come
sweep down my chimney.

Samantha says, "Why are
your short sleeve shorts
"always rolled up on the sleeves?"

These are not actually
rolled up right now,
so I don't know what you're talking about.
I don't know why I do it.
Obviously to show off my big muscles.

"If a giant meatball fell
on you, what would you do?"

Okay, so, there were some
episodes back in the day,
I think on Maury or something.

You know those trashy TV shows
about dysfunctional couples,
or weird things, or oddities,

or whatever people have
going on in their lives.
If it was weird-ish, it was on that show.

And there was an episode
all about people that

liked to be crushed by the
loves of their lives who would

sit on them until they
would like break their ribs.

I feel like that would
be what would happen
with me and a giant meatball.

I would request it, I
would want it to sit on me,
and I want it to break my ribs,
and I don't want to be able to breath,
and then I want to eat my way out.

I mean honestly, that's
the modern day love story.
Romeo and Juliet move over,
it's all about Tyler and the meatball.
But that is all I have for you guys today.
I hope you have a fabulous life.
Thank you so much for tuning in,
and pushing the thumbs up button.

If you like this video,
push the thumbs up button.

I'll wait. I think we
can get 100,000 likes
in the first day.
Did you push it? Thank you.
If you want to see my latest video
you can click right there.
It's me reacting to teens reacting to me.
It's really fun, and funny, and great,

and I like it, and I
love it a lot, actually.
So click that, enjoy it.
If you'd like to hear the latest podcast,
click right there.

This one was a lot of fun
for me and Courtney to make.

Again, go listen to it
and subscribe on iTunes.
It's completely free.

And if you want to be
my person of the week
just click right there.

And yeah, that's all I
have for you guys today.
I hope you have a fabulous life,
and I will see you guys next time.
Later.

title: Woman Stabs Husband With Squirrel (#AskTyler #33) | Tyler Oakley
